intro: Callisthene elisha-florae, commonly known as the Elisha's flower. It is a rare flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia. The plant is characterized by its delicate, clustered inflorescences and vibrant, bi-colored petals. Its leaves are broad and slightly heart-shaped, with a smooth, waxy texture. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
